data.text:
@HelenBranswell Watch "CDC under fire for allegedly withholding COVID-19 data" on YouTube
https://t.co/o7TobXZvAV
@HelenBranswell there may have been a day last week but this is good news...
@HelenBranswell These numbers are meaningless as most people use home tests.
@HelenBranswell They stopped pool testing in schools so there's no way to know if these numbers are reliable.
@HelenBranswell 907 new confirmed cases means covid is very much still here..this move to ripped off the masks is foolish and have a rebound affect
@jkentauthor @HelenBranswell So before COVID you masked your family right?

@HelenBranswell I live in MA. My family of 5 are all immunocompromised. Went to 2 different tiny stores yesterday (in Hudson and Northborough). 90% masks in Hudson. Only us in Northborough (4 unmasked employees). My 12 yo wore a KN95, and I had an N95. We're in the minority. Glad to see #s drop.
@HelenBranswell 2 weeks after Boston had a wastewater viral signal this low
